Infernal Resurgence.name: Infernal Resurgence
Infernal Resurgence.flavor: You revitalize yourself with the shreds of a defeated foe’s spirit.
Infernal Resurgence.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points
Infernal Resurgence.effect: You regain hit points as if you had spent a healing surge.

Hellfire Reprisal.name: Hellfire Reprisal
Hellfire Reprisal.flavor: As you strike, your anger at your foe’s attack on an ally manifests as baleful fire on your weapon.
Hellfire Reprisal.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target has hit an ally with an attack during this encounter, the attack deals fire damage equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier.

Burning Wrath Smite.name: Burning Wrath Smite
Burning Wrath Smite.flavor: You pour all your hate and anger into a single attack, leaving your stricken opponent aflame.
Burning Wrath Smite.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
